PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionSystemTypeOverheadContactlineSystem
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of an overhead contact line system. The property set is associated with the predefined type OVERHEAD_CONTACT_LINE_SYSTEM of IfcDistributionSystem.

PropertyDef.Name: SpanNominalLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of span as a design parameter for the overhead contactline system.

PropertyDef.Name: ContactWireStagger
PropertyDef.Definition: Lateral displacement of the contact wire to opposite sides of the track centre at successive supports.

PropertyDef.Name: ContactWireNominalDrop
PropertyDef.Definition: Vertical distance between the main catenary wire and the contact wire measured at a support point.

PropertyDef.Name: PressureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable maximum and minimum working pressure (relative to ambient pressure).

PropertyDef.Name: ContactWireNominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal distance from the top of the rail to the lower face of the contact wire, measured perpendicular to the track.

PropertyDef.Name: ContactWireUplift
PropertyDef.Definition: Vertical upward movement of the contact wire due to the force produced from the pantograph.

PropertyDef.Name: ElectricalClearance
PropertyDef.Definition: The recommended air clearances between earth and the live parts of the overhead contactline system.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfOverlappingSpans
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of overlapping spans in the overhead contactline system.

PropertyDef.Name: PantographType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of pantograph as a design parameter for the overhead contactline system.

PropertyDef.Name: TensionLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of overhead contactline between two terminating points. It is a design parameter for the overhead contactline system.

PropertyDef.Name: OCSType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of overhead contactline system (OCS).
